column2: So God created man in his own image
column3: So God created man in his own image, in the image of God he created him; male and female he created them.

column2: So you shall keep my commandments
column3: So you shall keep my commandments and do them: I am the LORD.

column2: You shall love the LORD your God
column3: You shall love the LORD your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your might.

column2: Oh give thanks to the LORD
column3: Oh give thanks to the LORD; call upon his name; make known his deeds among the peoples!
Hear this, O Job; stop and consider the wondrous works of God.

column2: Let the words of my mouth
column3: Let the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be acceptable in your sight, O LORD, my rock and my redeemer.
O God, hear my prayer; give ear to the words of my mouth.

column2: The LORD is good to all
column3: The LORD is good to all, and his mercy is over all that he has made.
Hear instruction and be wise, and do not neglect it.

column2: Even a child makes himself known
column3: Even a child makes himself known by his acts, by whether his conduct is pure and upright.

column2: He has told you, O man
column3: He has told you, O man, what is good; and what does the LORD require of you but to do justice, and to love kindness, and to walk humbly with your God?

column2: But I say to you, Love your enemies
column3: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
And whatever you ask in prayer, you will receive, if you have faith.
Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will not pass away.

column2: And as you wish that others
column3: And as you wish that others would do to you, do so to them.
And you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
Greater love has no one than this, that someone lay down his life for his friends.
But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit has come upon you, and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the end of the earth.
So then each of us will give an account of himself to God.
So, whether you eat or drink, or whatever you do, do all to the glory of God.
But all things should be done decently and in order.
Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right.
I can do all things through him who strengthens me.

column2: Know this, my beloved brothers: let every person
column3: Know this, my beloved brothers: let every person be quick to hear, slow to speak, slow to anger.
We love because he first loved us.
